title: Ticket #3520: Improve argument handling for blahp and cream jobs
description: When submitting a job to the blahp or CREAM, characters that have special meaning to the shell need to be escaped. Currently, the gridmanager doesn't do any escaping for these characters. The exact escaping rules are ill-defined. The rules for the blahp and CREAM are related, as CREAM uses the blahp.
